author: Staff Reporter
text:
Three days after a bomb hoax left schools aflutter, a bomb scare hit another school on Friday. Authorities of a school in Bhathavatsalam Colony, Vyasarpadi, discovered a bag containing fire crackers that resembled a country bomb. MKB Nagar police retrieved the bag. Following investigation, they revealed that the bag contained fire crackers.

A senior official of the Chennai City Police confirmed that the bag had only crackers and said they were conducting an enquiry.
title: Cracker bag creates a scare
